scripts.lint: yarn workspace jan lint && yarn workspace jan-web lint
scripts.test-local: yarn lint && yarn build:test && yarn test
scripts.dev:uikit: yarn workspace @janhq/uikit install && yarn workspace @janhq/uikit dev
scripts.build:uikit: yarn workspace @janhq/uikit install && yarn workspace @janhq/uikit build
scripts.build:core: cd core && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.build:extensions:windows: rimraf ./electron/pre-install/*.tgz && powershell -command "Get-ChildItem -Path './extensions' -Directory | ForEach-Object {Write-Host 'Building in' $_.FullName; Set-Location $_.FullName; npm install; npm run build:publish; Set-Location -LiteralPath '..\..';}"
scripts.build:extensions:linux: rimraf ./electron/pre-install/*.tgz && for dir in ./extensions/*; do if [ -d "$dir" ]; then (cd "$dir" && npm install && npm run build:publish); fi; done
scripts.build:extensions:darwin: rimraf ./electron/pre-install/*.tgz && for dir in ./extensions/*; do if [ -d "$dir" ]; then (cd "$dir" && npm install && npm run build:publish); fi; done
scripts.build:test: yarn build:web && yarn workspace jan build:test
scripts.build:publish: yarn build:web && yarn workspace jan build:publish
